segments.text: I see the boy is really going for those cookies, and I can't help but feel a bit disgusted by his greed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's being so reckless, climbing up on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, and it's making me feel a bit annoyed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll be able to get away with it without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and it's making me feel a bit sick to my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they learn a lesson about being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so messy and chaotic, it's really unpleasant to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit repulsed by their behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they have no regard for the mess they're making or the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they clean up after themselves and think about what they've done.
segments.speaker: PAR
